Richard ALSTON and Onno M. VAN NIJF (Edd.), Feeding the Ancient Greek City = Groningen - Royal Holloway Studies on the Greek City after the Classical Age. 1 (Leuven, 2008) pp. 85-108, 1 fig.

Paper presented during a workshop organised in Athens, in October 2004, as a panel in the Seventh International Conference on Urban History. - Levels of Urbanisation. - The Amount of Urban Land. - The Number of Urban Landowners. - Direct Cultivation. - Urban Lease-Holding. - Indirect Cultivation. - Conclusion.
